Articles.Content:
Here is a thread to post what you would like to see in future updates.

Personally, I would like to see some more planets, like another gas giant with rings, maybe a small asteroid field above Kerbin, maybe a Titan-ish moon?

Another idea is I think they should re-add the old Moho as a new planet, separate from Moho. Here is a wacky idea for a planet: a small gas giant maybe two times Kerbins size that is out in between Eeloo and Jool. Anyways, post your ideas/suggestions for future updates here!

P.S. I don't mean like post any suggestion here, I mean post like main things for updates, like the planet update (0.17), or the science update (0.22).
This is kind of what this whole forum subsection is for, dude.
I'd like to see a performance and bugfixing update.

I'd like to see a performance and bugfixing update.

A full optimization update probably wont happen until very late in development, once they've added most of the features they want for KSP 1.0.
